app_id.label: App ID
app_id.comment: Create and get yours at http://applications.mercadolibre.com

app_secret.label: Secret Key
app_secret.comment: Create and get yours at http://applications.mercadolibre.com

oficial_id.label: MercadoLivre Official Store ID
oficial_id.comment: Use only if your store is Oficial, check your id at: https://api.mercadolibre.com/sites/MLB/apparel/brands

store_id.label: Magento Store
store_id.comment: Select the your Magento Store that MercadoLivre orders will be placed

default.label: Default Item Options for Bulk Add
default.comment: Default settings for ads created using the 'Bulk Add' function

template.label: Ads Template
template.comment: Select the default template that you want to use on default when bulk export products

freeshipping.label: Free Shipping
freeshipping.comment: Select if your products has free shipping on default

type.label: Ad Type
type.comment: Select the ad type that you want on default

product_import_quantity.label: Use Store Stock Quantity
product_import_quantity.comment: Use store product stock when IMPORT ads from Mercadolibre

local_pick_up.label: Local Pickup
local_pick_up.comment: Allow local pickup to your orders

smart_stock.label: SmartStock (beta)
smart_stock.comment: Set Yes to Active Smart Stock This is a beta feature, we recommend to test first before use wide

no_manage_stock.label: Store without Stock Management
no_manage_stock.comment: If Set 'Yes', this module will send to mercadolivre always the maximum quantity possible, no matter what's set on your ad

auto_decrement_store_stock.label: Auto decrement Store Stock
auto_decrement_store_stock.comment: Set 'Yes' to auto drecrement store stock when a item is sold at MercadoLivre

auto_update_mercadolivre_qtd.label: Auto Update MercadoLivre Item Quantity based on Store Stock (For Simple Products Only)
auto_update_mercadolivre_qtd.comment:
Set 'Yes' to auto update item quantity on MercadoLivre based on Store Stock

Attention: When a item at MercadoLivre reach ZERO (0), the item is cloused and a new item has to be created.

auto_updated_price.label: Auto Update MercadoLivre Item Price Basead on Product Changes (For Simple Products Only)
auto_updated_price.comment: Will follow the priority order: 1) Mercadolivre Product Price, 2) Product Special Price, 3) Product Price

auto_update_image.label: Auto Update MercadoLivre Images Basead on Product Changes (For Simple Products Only)

close_pause.label: Action to take when product stock reaches zero

auto_update_variation.label: Auto Update to Mercadolivre Variations Fields (Image,Price and Qtd) for Configurable Products Only, when has changes at Store

allow_type_change.label: Allow change item type in active itens?

allow_description_change.label: Allow change the description on Itens that have sale?

melienvios.label: Melienvios 1 Configuration
melienvios.comment: These are the settings related to the shipping services used by your store. You just need to provide these data if your store uses Melienvios 1 (me1), otherwise leave it blank.

shipping.comment: Choose the shipping module default to be used when your store DO NOT use Melienvios
shipping.label: Shipping Configuration Others

shippingmethod.label: Shipping Module
shippingmethod.comment: Choose the default Store Module to put in your order when the buyer has manualy informed the shipping cost at Mercadolivre, or chose, 'to be agree'

default_service.label: Mercadolivre Shipping Service
default_service.comment: Choose one Mercadolivre Service to automatic post Tracking Code when the buyer has informed the shipping cost at MercadoLivre

send_email_customer.label: Send Emails to Customers
send_email_customer.comment:
Only Select 'NO' with you don't want that the store send emails to the customer
Attention:Incomplete Orders will not be Generate.

receive_email_copy.label: Receive BBc copy of clients emails
receive_email_copy.comment: Insert one email to receive bbc copy of clients emails (optional)

auto_give_feedback.label: Auto Qualify Buyers on Approved and Paid Orders with Positive
auto_give_feedback.comment: Auto Give FeedBack on Approved and Paid Orders

feedback_message.label: FeedBack Message At Approved and Paid Orders
feedback_message.comment: To be used on Mercadlivre Orders only when was not paid by MercadoPago , and the payment is "To be agree with the Seller"

paymentmethod.label: Payment accepts method for Mercadolivre Checkout
paymentmethod.comment: Use [CTRL] to SELECT more than one payment method to be excluded or DESELECT a payment method.

auto_create_invoice.label: Auto Create Invoice
auto_create_invoice.comment: Select 'Yes' case you want that Magento auto create a invoice for paid orders

order_status_new.label: Choose the status of new orders
order_status_new.comment: Go to system -> OrderStatuses and assign a new orders status to 'new' order state to custom with your own orders state name

order_status_approved.label: Choose the status of approved orders
order_status_approved.comment: Go to system -> OrderStatuses and assign a new orders status to 'new' order state to custom with your own orders state name

order_status_refunded.label: Choose the status of refunded orders
order_status_refunded.comment: Go to system -> OrderStatuses and assign a new orders status to 'new' order state to custom with your own orders state name

order_status_in_process.label: Choose the status when payment is pending
order_status_in_process.comment: Go to system -> OrderStatuses and assign a new orders status to 'new' order state to custom with your own orders state name

order_status_in_mediation.label: Choose the status when client open a mediation
order_status_in_mediation.comment: Go to system -> OrderStatuses and assign a new orders status to 'new' order state to custom with your own orders state name

order_status_rejected.label: Choose the status when payment was reject
order_status_rejected.comment: Go to system -> OrderStatuses and assign a new orders status to 'new' order state to custom with your own orders state name

order_status_cancelled.label: Choose the status when payment was canceled
order_status_cancelled.comment: Go to system -> OrderStatuses and assign a new orders status to 'new' order state to custom with your own orders state name

disable_image_ssl.label: Disable SSL for Images
disable_image_ssl.comment: Disable with you are getting problem with no show image on MercadoLivre

log.label: Enable Calls Log
log.comment: Show call logs from Store to Mercadolivre, recomend to keep off because this file can reach a big size. To work is necessary also that configuration > advanced > Log Setting is Enable. File is located in {{base_dir}}/var/thirdlevel_call.log

category_filter.label: Disable Category and Ad Count Filter on Create Ad.
category_filter.comment: Disable this, will improve performer on "create ad", but will make lose the features to sort by category

no_cron.label: Process Notifications Only with CronJob
no_cron.comment: If your Magento do not have cronjob configured or available, select NO to process notification each time that one notification is receved. If use CronJob the notification will run each minute

no_line.label: Process Notifications in RealTime
no_line.comment: Select Yes, if you don't want to wait to process the notifications, be aware that this will increase the number of notification processed and cause email send incorrectly to customers

max_notification_per_time.label: Notifications to be processed simultaneously
max_notification_per_time.comment: If this field is blank, the defaul value is 50, the number maximum depends on server configuration, incrise the numbers, can help the system process all notifcation faster, but it will turn the process slower

fields.delete_notification: Delete notification after is processed select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesnos 7 1 1 1

delete_notification_time.label: Days to Wait Before Deleting Failed Notifications from the Queue
delete_notification_time.comment: If no value is given, notification will be deleted after 6 days. Insert 0 if you never want the failed notification to be deleted

fields.norequest: Disable Pending Requests Queue select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesnos 8 1 1 1 By default all requests that were not sent to MercadoLivre due to store's authentication failure are kept in a pending line so they can be sent when the authentication is restore. Select Yes if you want this feature to be disabled.

custom_document_field.label: Custom field to save buyer's documment number
custom_document_field.comment: Type the name of the field in your database you want to save buyer's document number. Leave blank for default

max_image_custom.label: Custumized Maximum Pictures in Mercadolivre
max_image_custom.comment: Use only if your posting to classifiqued Mercadolivre section

enable_auto_cancelation_not_completed.label: Enable automatic cancelation for uncompleted orders
enable_auto_cancelation_not_completed.comment: Select Yes if you want uncompleted orders (eg. orders not payed) to be automatically canceled

days_before_auto_cancelation.label: Days to wait before cancel order (Mininum of 2 days)
days_before_auto_cancelation.comment: The number of days the system must wait before cancel uncompleted orders. Default is 6 days when not set

enable_auto_feedback_not_completed.label: Enable auto-feedback for uncompleted orders
enable_auto_feedback_not_completed.comment: Select Yes if you want the to send feedback for the canceled orders automatically

auto_feedback_rating.label: Auto-feedback rating
auto_feedback_rating.comment: Select the rating for the automatic feedback

auto_feedback_text.label: Text for the automatic feedback of canceled orders

title.label: Title
title.comment: The name that will appear at MercadoLivre paid orders
